sentence.Network_en: I loathe negativity. I can't stand people who moan.
sentence.Network_cn: 我厌恶消极态度，不能忍受唉声叹气的人。

sentence.Network_en: The two men loathe each other.
sentence.Network_cn: 两个男人互相看不顺眼。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 腻_百度百科 ... [be bored;be fed up] 因次数过多而感到厌烦 [loathe] 厌恶 [too greasy] 指食品含油脂量过高，使人吃不下去.
字典中恶字的解释 ... (1) 表示惊讶[ wu] (1) 讨厌;憎恶[ loathe;hate] (3) 嫉妒[ be envious;be green with envy].
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... loath 厌恶的 loathe 憎恶 lobby 休息室.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... loath 不情愿的，勉强的 loathe 憎恨，厌恶 lobby 大厅，休息厅.

list.abs: they loathe Bronka Ginsberg but aren't about to cross her .他们厌恶勃隆卡?京斯贝格，但不想和她作对。
ooh - did i say that i loathe you oh ., 我曾经说过厌恶你么.
I tell you I loathe and abhor my husband and I utterly despise him ., 我告诉你 , 我厌恶 , 憎恨我的丈夫 , 我彻底地看不起他!
I loathe you !, 我讨厌你!
loath什么意思及同义词... ... lief or loath 不管愿不愿意 nothing loath 很愿意,很乐意 loath to depart 送别的曲子.
loath的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... be loath for him to go 不愿意他去 nothing loath 很愿意, 很高兴.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English lāthian, of Germanic origin; related to loath

entry.def: If you loathe something or someone, you dislike them very much.

example.ex: The two men loathe each other...
example.tran: 两个男人互相看不顺眼。

example.ex: She loathed being the child of impoverished labourers.
example.tran: 她憎恨自己是贫困工人的孩子。

auth_sentence.content: Many in the contemporary art world loathe Sewell.
auth_sentence.res_content: Many in the contemporary art world loathe Sewell.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Many in the contemporary art world loathe Sewell.

auth_sentence.content: You can only imagine how they loathe me.
auth_sentence.res_content: You can only imagine how they loathe me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You can only imagine how they loathe me.

auth_sentence.content: Have type lovers ever found anything they loathe as much?
auth_sentence.res_content: Have type lovers ever found anything they loathe as much?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Have type lovers ever found anything they loathe as much?

sentences.en: I loathe having to get up so early in the morning!
sentences.cn: 我对这么早起来实在感到厌恶！
